Fall 2020 forecast: latest forecasts show that Fall will be heavily influenced by the developing La Nina ENSO cycle. The cold ENSO phase continues to strengthen and will extend its impact into Winter 2020/2021. A high-pressure area will dominate the North Pacific with a wave-train into the Atlantic.
